00107 /*
00108 #ifdef _WIN32
00109 #ifndef __MIN_MAX__
00110 #define __MIN_MAX__
00111 namespace std {
00112 //
00113 // undefine macros min and max to avoid conflicts with template names
00114 //
00115 #ifdef min
00116 #undef min
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #ifdef max
00120 #undef max
00121 #endif
00122 
00123 //
00124 // template functions 'min' and 'max' are not defined for _WIN32
00125 // due to name conflicts
00126 //
00127 template < class T > inline T min( T a, T b ) { return a < b ? a : b; }
00128 template < class T > inline T max( T a, T b ) { return a > b ? a : b; }
00129 }
00130 #endif
00131 #endif
00132 */

00199 void bfgs2( Array< double >& p,
00200             double gtol,
00201             unsigned& iter,
00202             double&   fret,
00203             double  (*func)( const Array< double >& ),
00204             void   (*dfunc)( const Array< double >&, Array< double >& ),
00205             unsigned iterMax,
00206             LinMinTypes linmintype )
00207 {
00208 
00209     const double   Lambda  = 0.025;
00210     const double   STPMX = 100.;
00211 
00212     bool check(false);
00213     unsigned i, j, n = p.nelem( );
00214     double   d, err, scale, sum, stpmax;
00215     double   test, temp;
00216 
00217     Array< double > p1( n );
00218     Array< double > g0( n );
00219     Array< double > g1( n );
00220     Array< double > s ( n );
00221     Array< double > g ( n );
00222 
00223     Array< double > H ( n, n );
00224 
00225     Array< double > gamma( n );
00226     Array< double > delta( n );
00227 
00228     iter = 0;
00229 
00230     dfunc( p, g0 );
00231 
00232     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00233         for( H( i, i ) = 1., j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00234             H( i, j ) = H( j, i ) = 0.;
00235         s( i ) = -g( i );
00236         sum += p( i ) * p( i );
00237     }
00238 
00239     stpmax = STPMX * std::max( sqrt( sum ), ( double ) n );
00240 
00241     for( err = 0., i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00242         err += g0( i ) * g0( i );
00243     if( err < gtol*gtol ) {
00244         fret = func( p );
00245         return;
00246     }
00247 
00248     for( i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00249         for( j = 0; j < n; ++j )
00250             H( i, j ) = 0.;
00251         H( i, i ) = 1.;
00252     }
00253 
00254     for( ; ; ) {
00255         for( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00256             for( s( i ) = 0., j = 0; j < n; ++j )
00257                 s( i ) -= H( i, j ) * g0( j );
00258 
00259         //
00260         // line search
00261         //
00262         switch (linmintype) 
00263         {
00264             case LNSRCH :
00265                 lnsrch( p, func( p ), g0, s, p1, fret, stpmax, check, func );
00266                 cout << "check = " << check << endl;
00267                 break;
00268             case CBLNSRCH :
00269                 cblnsrch( p, func( p ), g0, s, p1, fret, func, Lambda );
00270                 break;
00271             case LINMIN :
00272                 p1 = p;
00273                 linmin( p1, s, fret, func );
00274                 break;
00275             case DERIVLINMIN :
00276                 p1 = p;
00277                 dlinmin( p1, s, fret, func, dfunc );
00278                 break;
00279             default :
00280                 p1 = p;
00281                 dlinmin( p1, s, fret, func, dfunc );
00282                 break;
00283         }
00284 
00285         //cblnsrch( p, func( p ), g0, s, p1, fret, func, Lambda );
00286         dfunc( p1, g1 );
00287         for( err = 0., i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00288             err += g1( i ) * g1( i );
00289         if( ++iter >= iterMax || err <= gtol*gtol )
00290             break;
00291 
00292         //
00293         // test for convergence
00294         //
00295         test = 0.;
00296         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00297             temp = fabs( p1( i ) - p( i ) ) / std::max( fabs( p( i ) ), 1.);
00298             if( temp > test )
00299                 test = temp;
00300         }
00301         if( test < gtol )
00302             return;
00303 
00304         for( d = 0., i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00305             d += ( gamma(i) = g1(i)-g0(i) ) * ( delta(i) = p1(i)-p(i) );
00306 
00307         for( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00308             for( s( i ) = 0., j = 0; j < n; ++j )
00309                 s( i ) += H( i, j ) * gamma( j );
00310 
00311         if( d < 1e-8 ) {
00312             for( i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00313                 for( j = 0; j < n; ++j )
00314                     H( i, j ) = 0.;
00315                 H( i, i ) = 1.;
00316             }
00317         } else {
00318             for( scale = 0., i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00319                 scale += gamma( i ) * s( i );
00320             scale = ( scale / d + 1 ) / d;
00321 
00322             for( i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00323                 g0( i ) = g1( i );
00324                 p ( i ) = p1( i );
00325                 for( j = 0; j < n; ++j )
00326                     H( i, j ) += scale * delta(i) * delta(j)
00327                       - ( s(i) * delta(j) + s(j) * delta(i) ) / d;
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332     for( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00333         p( i ) = p1( i );
00334 }
